translations.chinese: 孝惠皇帝，高祖太子也，母曰呂皇后。
translations.english: Emperor Hui was Gaozu's crown prince. His mother was Empress Lü.

translations.chinese: 帝年五歲，高祖初為漢王。
translations.english: The emperor was five years old when Gaozu first became King of Han.
In the second year, he was established as crown prince.

translations.chinese: 十二年四月，高祖 崩。
translations.english: In the twelfth year, fourth month, Gaozu passed away.

translations.chinese: 五月丙寅，太子即皇帝位，尊皇后曰皇太后。
translations.english: In the fifth month on the day bingyin, the crown prince ascended the imperial throne. He honored the empress as empress dowager.
